snippet: SCHIFF--Ivy, 82, passed away on June 11 following two years battling cancer. Up until four weeks before her death, Ivy enjoyed a life rich with theater, opera, classes at the New School, myriad friends and loving family. After attending Brandeis and completing a master's in education at St Johns, Ivy was a New York City public school teacher and administrator. She is survived by her children; Robin Schiff (David Michaelson), Matthew (Rina), Claudia Eff (Tom), Jennifer Berg (Mitchell), nine grandchildren, stepsons Andrew and Matthew Berchuck, and her brother and sister-in-law, Mark and Muriel Graber. She was pre-deceased by husbands, Lawrence Robert Schiff and Irving Berchuck. 1/3
